input.sentences: it was almost time for the bike race
all the people had come from miles to watch the race
it was even going to be on tv
each rider prepared for the race
and off to the races they went
output.sentences: It was about time for the bike race.
The people gathered to watch the race.
The tv crew was also there to film it.
The rider was getting prepared for the race.
The rider races to the finish line.
